attributes.action: Refresher Car Tests For The Edlerly Over 65
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As I driver for 4 years, I Notice a Lot of elderly  drivers which are not use to driving into days society, As a Result they become an hazzard. for the modern driver!. On Occasions i witness elderly driver either drive half the speed limit, Get into the wrong lanes at islands and junctions and resulting in cutting other driver up. A retest should be made compulsory to see if there are competent to drive on the roads.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
